name: Mountain Troll
description: A hideous, twisted giant born out of a rock, wearing purloined armor and a belt of severed heads.

features.name: Relentless (3) - Passive
features.text: The Troll can be spotlighted up to three times per GM turn. Spend Fear as usual to spotlight them.

features.name: Stolen Armor - Passive
features.text: When combat begins, active a Countdown equal to the number of PCs. Whenever the Troll takes damage, tick down the countdown and reduce the HP the Troll marks by 1. When it triggers, the Troll evolves into an Enraged Mountain Troll.

features.name: Flail Swipe - Action
features.text: The Troll swings their skull flail in a wide arc. Mark a Stress to make an attack against all targets in front of the Troll within Very Close range. On a success, the Troll deals 2d10+3 instead of its normal damage. The Troll cannot use this action while evolved.

features.name: Enraged Mountain Troll - Evolution
features.text: The Troll gains a +1 bonus to their Difficulty and their standard attack changes to: Claw Swipe: Very Close | 1d8+1 phy.

features.name: Double Swipe - Action
features.text: Spend a Fear to move the Troll up to Close range and immediately make two standard attacks against a single target within Melee range. If both attacks hit, combine the damage and the target also loses a Hope.

name: Rabble Mawb
description: These cat-sized balls of hair, limbs, and teeth travel in a 'mawb' of about a dozen.

features.name: Horde (1d4) - Passive
features.text: When the Rabble Mawb has marked half or more of their HP, their standard attack deals 1d4 physical damage instead.

features.name: Come Back Worse - Reaction
features.text: When a Rabble Mawb is defeated, you can spend a Fear to bring this Rabble Mawb back to life. This new Rabble Mawb gains a +X bonus to all rolls, where X is the number of times this feature has been used by this adversary.

name: Redcap Candlemaker
description: A pale, gaunt cult leader holding a seven-foot-tall rod with a candle made from a hanged man's hand atop it.

features.name: Hand of Glory - Passive
features.text: When the Candlemaker appears, put five tokens on this stat block. Remove one token whenever the Candlemaker marks a HP. While this stat block has one or more tokens on it, the Candlemaker is Hidden.

features.name: Torchbearer - Passive
features.text: The light of the Candlemaker's hand of glory inspires bloodlust in their allies. While this stat block has one or more tokens on it, any Redcap within Close range gains a +1 bonus to their damage rolls.

features.name: Dance in the Flames - Action
features.text: Spend a token from this stat block. The Candlemaker conjures a ball of fire at a point within Far range. All creatures within Very Close range of that point must make an Agility Reaction Roll. Targets who fail take 2d10 magic damage. Targets who succeed take half damage.

name: Redcap Butcher
description: A halfling-sized fey creature who hacks their victims apart with a variety of cutting implements.

features.name: Chop Happy - Action
features.text: Mark a Stress to make a standard attack against up to three targets within range. For each target who marks a HP, you gain a Fear.

features.name: Knife Thrower - Action
features.text: Mark a Stress to make a standard attack against a target within Far range. If the Butcher makes this attack while Hidden, they have advantage on the attack roll.

name: Doppelhund
description: A vicious magical six-legged hellhound with glowing red eyes and two long, toothy squid arms. They confuse enemies by conjuring an illusory duplicate of themself.

features.name: Blink Beast - Passive
features.text: When combat begins, place a duplicate within Close range of the Doppelhund. The duplicate can move when the Doppelhund is spotlighted. The Doppelhund occupies both places until attacked (roll d6: Even=Real, Odd=Duplicate). Attacks against duplicate fail. Successful attack on real one dispels duplicate until you spend Fear to conjure it again.

features.name: Double Lash - Reaction
features.text: When the Doppelhund makes a standard attack, you can mark a Stress to make an additional standard attack. If both attacks target the same creature, combine the damage.

name: Dragon Knight
description: A knight clad in dragonplate armor and a helmet in the shape of a dragon's head.

features.name: High Ground - Passive
features.text: The Knight gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls when attacking a target from above.

features.name: Enhanced Critical - Passive
features.text: The Knight's attack roll counts as a critical success if the result on the d20 is a 19 or a 20.

features.name: Leaping Strike - Action
features.text: Mark a Stress and choose a target within Far range. The Knight moves into Melee range of the target and make a standard attack against them. On a success, gain a +1d12 bonus to the damage roll and the target must mark an Armor Slot without receiving its benefits.

name: Gobstalker
description: A fleshy, floating ball of teeth with ten jointed antennae rising from its crown, each bearing a different-colored eye.

features.name: Relentless (3) - Passive
features.text: The Gobstalker can be spotlighted up to three times per GM turn. Spend Fear as usual to spotlight them.

features.name: Anti-mystica-halitosis - Passive
features.text: A Gobstalker's breath creates an invisible miasma that negates magical effects. Any attack that deals magic damage or creates a magical effect in front of the Gobstalker within Close range automatically fails.

features.name: Eyestalks - Action
features.text: Mark a Stress to attack a target within Far range. On a hit, spend a Fear to roll d10 for a random effect (1. Beguile, 2. Corrode, 3. Doom, 4. Hypnosis, 5. Paralyze, 6. Petrify, 7. Push, 8. Sear, 9. Slow, 10. Terrify).

name: Gargoyle
description: A magically animated statue in the form of a terrifying beast or devil.

features.name: Stone Body - Passive
features.text: The Gargoyle is resistant to physical damage.

features.name: Just a Statue - Passive
features.text: Before they make their first attack in a fight or after they become Hidden, the Gargoyle is indistinguishable from a normal statue.

features.name: Swooping Strike - Action
features.text: Choose a point within Far range. The Gargoyle moves to that point in a straight line and makes an attack against one target along its path.

name: Chimera
description: A giant, fire-breathing monster with a lion's head, a goat's body, and a serpent's tail.

features.name: Rending Jaws - Passive
features.text: When the Chimera makes a successful attack, the target must mark 2 Armor Slots instead of 1 to reduce the damage by one threshold.

features.name: Breath of Fire - Action
features.text: Spend a Fear to target up to three PCs in front of the Chimera within Close range. All targets must make an Agility Reaction Roll (20). Targets who fail take 3d12 magic damage.

features.name: Serpent Strike - Reaction
features.text: When the Chimera is attacked by a PC within Very Close range, mark a Stress to make an attack against them. On a success, deal 4d4+10 physical damage and Poison them.

features.name: Double Claw - Reaction
features.text: After the Chimera makes a standard attack, you can mark a Stress to make an additional standard attack. If both attacks target the same creature, combine the damage.

name: Whisper Wraith
description: The echoes of broken promises and dreams unfulfilled, these wraiths appear as floating, translucent shrouds of tattered black velvet.

features.name: Spectral - Passive
features.text: The Wraith is immune to physical damage and weak against magic damage. Additionally, the Wraith can move through solid objects.

features.name: Spooky - Passive
features.text: When the Wraith makes a successful attack, all PCs within Close range must mark a Stress and you gain a Fear.

features.name: Nightmare Shroud - Action
features.text: Spend a Fear to have the Wraith wrap themself around a PC within Melee range, making them Shrouded until they succeed on a Strength or Attack Roll (20).

name: Fellmounted Shadow King
description: The shade of a forgotten ruler, cursed to patrol the skies atop a winged eel in the service of an evil demiurge.

features.name: Light and Shadow - Passive
features.text: The Shadow King gains a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls while in shadow or darkness and a -1 penalty to attack and damage rolls while in bright light.

features.name: Relic Hunter - Passive
features.text: The Shadow King has advantage on attacks against PCs with magical weapons or armor equipped.

features.name: Hellsong - Action
features.text: Spend 2 Fear to have the Shadow King's mount unleash a spine-chilling screech. All PCs within Far range must make a Presence Reaction Roll (18) or mark Stress/Hope.

features.name: Air Support - Reaction
features.text: Three times per scene, you can spend a Fear to have an adversary within Far range of the Shadow King reroll a missed attack with advantage.

name: Lamplight Beguiler
description: A huge mer-creature who lures unwary prey into eating range with their dangling, shapeshifting head stalk.

features.name: Doppel-Dangler - Action
features.text: The membranous cluster at the end of the Beguiler's head stalk can shapeshift into any humanoid form. Mark a Stress and choose a PC. Their player must tell you what form their PC would find most trustworthy.

features.name: Entice - Action
features.text: Spend a Fear to play an alluring overture to a PC within Close range. The PC must succeed on a Presence Reaction Roll (18) or move into Melee range with the Beguiler.

features.name: Entangle - Reaction
features.text: When a PC moves within Melee range, you can spend a Fear to make an attack against them. On a successful attack, the target is Swallowed.

features.name: Rest and Digest - Reaction
features.text: When the Beguiler takes the spotlight with a Swallowed creature inside them, they move to Far range away from the PCs.

name: Hallowed Choir
description: A heavenly host of winged humanoids whose song calls forth tears of religious awe.

features.name: Aural Assault - Action
features.text: Spend a Fear to have the Choir unleash divine energy. Remove all tokens from this stat block. For each token removed, deal 1d12 direct magic damage to all enemies within Close range.

features.name: Celestial Coda - Reaction
features.text: Countdown (Loop 3). The Choir's divine song builds on itself with each refrain. Activate the countdown when the Choir is first spotlighted. When it triggers, place a token on this stat block.

name: Owl Witch
description: A giant, vengeful barn owl with a 15-foot wingspan and a human face.

features.name: Ill Omen - Passive
features.text: When a PC within Close range makes an action roll, their Fear Die gains a bonus equal to the amount of Fear you currently have.

features.name: Witch Barrier - Passive
features.text: The Owl Witch is resistant to magic damage.

features.name: Alluring Voice - Action
features.text: The Owl Witch can perfectly mimic the voice of a loved one. Spend a Fear to have the Owl Witch call out to a creature. The target must succeed on an Instinct Reaction Roll or move up to Far range toward the Owl Witch.

features.name: Nightmare Stare - Action
features.text: Spend a Fear to have the Owl Witch Afflict a target within Far range with waking nightmares.

features.name: Visions of a Violent End - Reaction
features.text: When the Owl Witch is targeted by an attack, you can spend a Fear to force the attacker to make a Presence Reaction Roll. On a failure, they mark 1d4 Stress.

features.name: Relentless (X) - Passive
features.text: Xero can be spotlighted up to X times per GM turn, where X is the number of PCs in the scene.

features.name: Collateral Damage - Passive
features.text: Xero's movement cannot be hindered. All destructible terrain or obstacles in Xero's path are destroyed when Xero moves through them.

features.name: Gigaton Stomp - Action
features.text: Spend a Fear to have Xero bring their foot down hard. All creatures within Melee range take 4d12 physical damage and are Restrained. Creatures outside Melee but within Close must succeed Instinct Reaction or be knocked back to Far.

features.name: Power Slide - Action
features.text: Mark a Stress to move Xero up to Close range. All creatures Xero moves through must make a Strength Reaction Roll. Targets who fail must mark 2 Armor Slots or take Severe Damage.

features.name: Radioactive Breath - Action
features.text: Spend a Fear to have Xero charge up a nuclear beam. Next spotlight, unleash it: Line with Close width to edge of battlefield. Agility Reaction. Fail: 4d12+12 direct magic. Success: Half.

features.name: Regeneration - Action
features.text: Up to three times per scene, spend any number of Fear to clear an equal number of HP.

name: Cephilith Priest
description: A robe-wearing, squid-headed humanoid from the Outer Realms.

features.name: Psychic Blast - Action
features.text: Spend a Fear and choose up to three targets within Close range to make a Knowledge or Instinct Reaction Roll (20). Targets who succeed take 2d10+5 direct magical damage. Targets who fail take 4d10+10 direct magical damage and are Vulnerable until spotlighted.

features.name: Cerebral Suction - Action
features.text: Spend a Fear to choose a Vulnerable target within Melee range. The Priest grabs the target and tries to insert their face tentacles. The target must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll or mark 1d6 Stress. The Priest clears a number of Stress equal to the number of Stress the target marked.

features.name: Telekinetic Grasp - Reaction
features.text: When the Priest succeeds on a standard attack, you can mark a Stress to Restrain the target until they spend a Hope to clear this condition.

name: Grand Father
description: An ancient, twisted tree of flesh and bone.

features.name: Relentless (3) - Passive
features.text: The Grand Father can be spotlighted up to three times per GM turn.

features.name: Rooted - Passive
features.text: The Grand Father cannot move but has Very Far reach with all attacks.

features.name: Consume - Action
features.text: Spend a Fear to target a PC. They must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (20) or be pulled adjacent to the Grand Father and Restrained. While Restrained, they take 4d8 acid damage at the start of each of their turns.

features.name: Spore Cloud - Action
features.text: Mark a Stress to release a cloud of spores in Close range. All creatures in range must succeed on a Body Reaction Roll (20) or become Poisoned.
